title: VAYNE SUCK
body: like u need rework vayne give her litlle buff on Q and on her R but main reson i write this u need to make her Q can go over tiny wals so pls that will been  super cool for escaping and outplaying so bcs can u do that : :) !

replies.body: Get good, or accept that you can't play her and move on like me.

Vayne is perfectly fine. You're just probably not very good at League.

Don't play a high skill level champ who's a serious late game hyper carry and claim they suck. Especially when they don't in the slightest.
are u the guy who made troll posts about riven on a different account?
Not sure if troll or just bad.

here is a brief history of vayne:

vayne sucks - riot buffs her

vayne is broken op - riot nerfs her

vayne sucks - riot buffs her

vayne is broken op - riot nerfs her

vayne sucks - riot buffs her

vayne is broken op - riot nerfs her


because her design sucks dick and shes one of the most binary, 0 counterplay champions in this game. she has tools to outplay her opponent, but nothing in her kit that her opponent can play around.
